page.title: 02INDUSTRY,HORTONWOOD,TELFORD
page.content: Hortonwood industrial estate is relatively new and unfinished and is situated on an extensive level site in Trench.This was formerly farmland.The industrial units are surrounded by grassland which borders the rural area known as Horton. It is served by good road links to other parts of Telford,the A442 to Chester and Whitchurch,and the M54 to the West Midlands. At present,there are three large industrial units - a polythene and paper packaging plant,a brass founders and an icecream manufacturer and frozen food wholesalers. There are also twenty small units concerned with light industrial manu- facture or warehousing.An example is Martin Industrial Ltd. which makes robots and robot components.This is a relativey new industry for Telford.
